entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
